DOC.brief_summary: The ACIC Collaborative Quality Improvement ( CQI ) program involve collection data relate : indication Coronary Computed Tomography ( CCTA ) , patient health characteristic , acquisition technique CCTA scan , physician interpretation result short-term outcome 90 day period .
DOC.detailed_description: This study collaborative quality assurance initiative organize Blue Cross Blue Shield Michigan Blue Cross Network ( BCBSM/BCN ) initiation insurance coverage coronary artery CT scanning ( CCTA ) , relatively new procedure provide non-invasive coronary angiogram . While procedure promise rapidly diagnose patient unknown chest pain reduce cost medical care , substantial potential abuse excess cost inappropriate care appropriately use .
